Class JiraClientFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.radixware.jiraclient.implementation.common.JiraClientFactory

  • public class JiraClientFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Factory allowing to get actual client. SOAP (versions 3.3 - 5.0), REST (versions 5.0 and greater).
    Author:
    ashamsutdinov
